name: Intergalactic Chat Simulator
description:
Written for the jam, this story takes you to the road. I was hoping to add a few mini games in between and so there might be an update later.

I might expand on to the story a bit if the structure is well liked. There are quite a number of different endings so be sure to try it all. On a side note, I originally planned for this story to be consisting of pixel art and so I might add some of that later too.

I feel like I could expand on the characters a little more but that was taking the narrative away from the point, I was hoping to keep the festive spirit - which I think I could expand a bit more.

If this one is well liked then I would make a horror game next.
